description.en: Malaysia's Consumer Price Index (CPI) is a monthly publication which presents statistics covering 12 main groups of goods and services. This is consistent with the classification according to the United Nations "Classification of Individual Consumption According to Purpose (COICOP)".
description.bm: Indeks Harga Pengguna (IHP) Malaysia merupakan penerbitan bulanan yang memaparkan statistik meliputi 12 kumpulan utama barangan dan perkhidmatan. Ini selaras dengan klasifikasi yang berpandukan kepada United Nations "Classification of Individual Consumption According to Purpose (COICOP)".

variables.name: date
variables.desc_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with MM-DD set to -01-01
variables.desc_bm: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan MM-DD diberi nilai -01-01

variables.name: category
variables.desc_en: [Categorical] 13 values either denoting headline CPI, or one of the 12 main COICOP categories.
variables.desc_bm: [Kategori] 13 nilai sama ada bagi IHP keseluruhan, ataupun satu daripada 12 kategori utama COICOP.

variables.name: johor
variables.desc_en: [Float] Index with base 2010 = 100, showing the CPI value for Johor by category of consumption.
variables.desc_bm: [Apung] Indeks dengan asas 2010 = 100, yang menunjukkan nilai IHP untuk Johor mengikut kategori perbelanjaan.

en.methodology: The index is compiled based on the average price change for goods and services collected according to price collection centers in the state.
en.caveat: This index is compiled based on Classification of Individual Consumption According to Purpose (COICOP).
en.publication: [Consumer Price Index, Jul 2023](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/monthly_2023-07_cpi.pdf), the latest edition of the monthly consumer price statistics published by DOSM. OpenDOSM also features a [dashboard on consumer prices](https://open.dosm.gov.my/consumer-prices).

bm.methodology: Indeks disusun berdasarkan perubahan purata harga bagi barangan dan perkhidmatan yang dikutip mengikut pusat pungutan harga di dalam negeri.
bm.caveat: Indeks ini disusun berdasarkan Classification of Individual Consumption According to Purpose (COICOP).
bm.publication: [Indeks Harga Pengguna, Jul 2023](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/monthly_2023-07_cpi.pdf), edisi terkini bagi statistik harga pengguna yang diterbitkan oleh DOSM. OpenDOSM sendiri juga memaparkan [papan pemuka khas tentang harga pengguna](https://open.dosm.gov.my/consumer-prices).
